input.sentences: the two fireworks going off together were great

output.sentences: As a pyrotechnician, it was my job to make sure the fireworks show went off without a glitch.
For example, when a single firework is lit, it needs to build anticipation.
The prior single color firework perfectly sets up the red mixture firework.
Then the cascade of purple fireworks puts the cherry on top for everyone to enjoy
It's always a special night when my fireworks show goes off as intended.
